title: 我的第一篇博客
text:
这是我的第一篇博客文章！
我正在学习如何使用 Quarto 搭建个人网站，感觉非常棒。

title: 我的项目
text:
这里是我参与和完成的一些项目，点击标题可以了解更多详情。

项目一：基于 Python 的电影推荐系统

技术栈: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn
描述: 实现了一个简单的协同过滤推荐算法…



项目二：城市空气质量可视化

技术栈: R, Shiny, ggplot2
描述: 创建了一个交互式仪表盘，用于展示…

title: Jiayang Gu顾嘉扬
text:
I am a PhD student in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Warwick, advised by Prof. Hongkai Wen. My current research interests focus on the transfer learning of diffusion models.
I received my Master’s degree from the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC) and my Bachelor’s degree from Zhejiang University of Technology (ZJUT).

title: Publications
text:
2025
Debiased Orthogonal Boundary-driven Efficient Noise Mitigation  Hao Li†, Jiayang Gu†, Jingkuan Song, An Zhang, Lianli Gao. ArXiv Preprint, 2025.  [ PDF ] [ Code ]



2024
RRE: A Relevance Relation Extraction Framework for Cross-domain Recommender System at Alipay  Jiayang Gu†, Xovee Xu†, Yulu Tian, Yurun Hu, Jiadong Huang, Wenliang Zhong, Fan Zhou, Lianli Gao. ICME 2024. Oral. Best Paper Candidate.  [ PDF ] [ Code ] [ Slides ]



2023
End-to-end Image Captioning via Visual Region Aggregation and Dual-level Collaboration  Jingkuan Song, Pengpeng Zeng, Jiayang Gu, Jinkuan Zhu, Lianli Gao. International Journal of Software & Informatics, 13(2), 2023.  [ PDF ] [ Code ]

† Equal contribution.
